DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to monitor the long term safety of duloxetine in the treatment of stress urinary incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: Duloxetine in the Treatment of Stress Urinary Incontinence.
DOC.criteria: Women with predominant stress urinary incontinence. 7 or more incontinence episodes per week. Use of monoamine inhibitors.
